name: Rend Mind
description: When you use your Psychic Blades to deal Sneak Attack damage, you can force the target to make a Wisdom saving throw. If the save fails, the target is stunned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. You can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest, unless you expend three Psionic Energy dice.
